name: Php-contact-form-v2
body:
### PHP Contact form V2

The Repository is based on the Contact form displaying the message in the same page after submitting the form.

## Usage

Change the id of the form.
Change the name of the inputs in form both in Index.php & sendmail.php
Change the email id in  sendmail.php

## Support

Having Trouble contact [srinivas](srnvs0708@gmail.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
